EM.content: Hegel’s Phenomenology as truth of soul, the relevé of anthropology, of man
EM.linkedContent: Hegel’s Phenomenology as truth of soul, the relevé of anthropology, of man

EM.content: Aufheben is relever: at the same time > déplacer, élever, remplacer et promouvoir
phenomenology as relève of anthropology, no longer but still a science of man
EM.linkedContent: phenomenology as relève of anthropology, no longer but still a science of man

EM.content: in all structures described in Phenom… l’homme y reste en son relief, equivocal relation to relief (relevance) marque sans doute la fin de l’homme, man past, but also achievement of man > c’est la fin de l’homme fini, end of finitude of man, unity of infinite and finite
EM.linkedContent: in all structures described in Phenom… l’homme y reste en son relief, equivocal relation to relief (relevance) marque sans doute la fin de l’homme, man past, but also achievement of man > c’est la fin de l’homme fini, end of finitude of man, unity of infinite and finite

EM.content: “la relève ou la relevance de l’homme est son télos ou son eskhaton”
EM.linkedContent: “la relève ou la relevance de l’homme est son télos ou son eskhaton”

EM.content: the relevance accomplished in Hegelian metaphysics persists wherever metaphysics, our language, maintains its authority, even in pre-Hegelian systems (i.e. in Kant, figure of finitude organizes capacity to know from emergence of anthropological limit)
EM.linkedContent: the relevance accomplished in Hegelian metaphysics persists wherever metaphysics, our language, maintains its authority, even in pre-Hegelian systems (i.e. in Kant, figure of finitude organizes capacity to know from emergence of anthropological limit)

PPHS.content: authority of voice: coordinated w/ entire Hegelian system: its archeology, teleology, eschatology, its will to parousia > process of sign is an Aufhebung, negativity
PPHS.linkedContent: authority of voice: coordinated w/ entire Hegelian system: its archeology, teleology, eschatology, its will to parousia > process of sign is an Aufhebung, negativity

PPHS.content: Hegel: negativity of intelligence, Aufhebung of sign relieves/promotes beyond natural, sensual, spatial
PPHS.linkedContent: Hegel: negativity of intelligence, Aufhebung of sign relieves/promotes beyond natural, sensual, spatial

PPHS.content: acc. Hegel, relève of space is time, time is truer than space: what space will have meant is time [future anterior], sensory intution of sign relevé in passage of time
PPHS.linkedContent: acc. Hegel, relève of space is time, time is truer than space: what space will have meant is time [future anterior], sensory intution of sign relevé in passage of time

PPHS.content: acc. Hegel, poetry, most relevant art (time & sound), must be spoken, not read (united to conceptual representation unlike music)
PPHS.linkedContent: acc. Hegel, poetry, most relevant art (time & sound), must be spoken, not read (united to conceptual representation unlike music)

PPHS.content: for Hegel, machine works as a negation w/out relève, thus Hegel could never think a machine that could work! that which doesn’t work in service of meaning: pure loss
PPHS.linkedContent: for Hegel, machine works as a negation w/out relève, thus Hegel could never think a machine that could work! that which doesn’t work in service of meaning: pure loss

T.content: philosophy has always thought its other, that which limits it; does to think the other solely mean relever, to control the other? or does the limit/passage always reserve one more coup; to think the proper of the other, the other as such is to miss it, to miss the missing of the other [on manque (de) le manquer]: examine the relevance of the limit
T.linkedContent: philosophy has always thought its other, that which limits it; does to think the other solely mean relever, to control the other? or does the limit/passage always reserve one more coup; to think the proper of the other, the other as such is to miss it, to miss the missing of the other [on manque (de) le manquer]: examine the relevance of the limit

T.content: Being, understood as [philosophy’s] proper, assures w/out let up (sans relâche) the relevant of reappropriation, the law of its proper weave (tissu), the economy of its representation
T.linkedContent: Being, understood as [philosophy’s] proper, assures w/out let up (sans relâche) the relevant of reappropriation, the law of its proper weave (tissu), the economy of its representation

WM.content: Hegel: metaphorical element in use of word disappears, words becomes literal, word carried over from sensuous to spiritual [i.e. Fassen, begreifen]: relevé into a spiritual meaning
WM.linkedContent: Hegel: metaphorical element in use of word disappears, words becomes literal, word carried over from sensuous to spiritual [i.e. Fassen, begreifen]: relevé into a spiritual meaning

OS.content: Derrida doesn’t think Heidegger considers relever in his reading of Hegel’s concept of time
OS.linkedContent: Derrida doesn’t think Heidegger considers relever in his reading of Hegel’s concept of time

POS.content: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is
POS.linkedContent: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is

POS.content: differential substitution of writing, remainder, death, phallus, excrement, infant, semen, or everything in this not subject to relève
POS.linkedContent: differential substitution of writing, remainder, death, phallus, excrement, infant, semen, or everything in this not subject to relève

P.content: economize on the abyss: 1) textual art of reprise, s’épargner la chute en tissant et repliant à l’infini le tissu, multiply patches (pièces) 2) abyssal operation (formalize rules, constrain logic, reappropriate): work toward rèleve & that in it which regularly reproduces collapse
P.linkedContent: economize on the abyss: 1) textual art of reprise, s’épargner la chute en tissant et repliant à l’infini le tissu, multiply patches (pièces) 2) abyssal operation (formalize rules, constrain logic, reappropriate): work toward rèleve & that in it which regularly reproduces collapse

O.content: direction or chain of the “metaphysical” can’t be opposed by concept, rather by process of textual labor, the movement of differance, which cannot be relevé—disorganizes opposition
O.linkedContent: direction or chain of the “metaphysical” can’t be opposed by concept, rather by process of textual labor, the movement of differance, which cannot be relevé—disorganizes opposition

O.content: differance inscribes contradictions, is the critical limit of idealizing powers of la relève (Aufgehoben), which reduces contradictions to homogeneity of single model
O.linkedContent: differance inscribes contradictions, is the critical limit of idealizing powers of la relève (Aufgehoben), which reduces contradictions to homogeneity of single model

SW.content: the remaining intact or tearing of the veil is the same: l’une se garde de l’autre > 2 liftings (deux relèves), you want to have finished w/ the veil: to have finished w/ oneself, that’s the veil
SW.linkedContent: the remaining intact or tearing of the veil is the same: l’une se garde de l’autre > 2 liftings (deux relèves), you want to have finished w/ the veil: to have finished w/ oneself, that’s the veil

C.content: paradox of paradigm: deposed from its privilege moment it’s built, inscribed in a series, an out-of-series cartouche > remains heterogenous by virtue of its relief
C.linkedContent: paradox of paradigm: deposed from its privilege moment it’s built, inscribed in a series, an out-of-series cartouche > remains heterogenous by virtue of its relief

C.content: do eyes touch like lips? what is contact if it intervenes? a sealed interruption, or the continual, negating upheaval (relevante) of the interval—the death of btwn?
C.linkedContent: do eyes touch like lips? what is contact if it intervenes? a sealed interruption, or the continual, negating upheaval (relevante) of the interval—the death of btwn?

C.content: spacing & “distance” are thought by Chrétian [by Christian theology of flesh], reduced to phenomenology of finitude, que le toucher spirituel (infini, immédiat, etc.) aura commencé par élever et relever [differance serving to close closure]
C.linkedContent: spacing & “distance” are thought by Chrétian [by Christian theology of flesh], reduced to phenomenology of finitude, que le toucher spirituel (infini, immédiat, etc.) aura commencé par élever et relever [differance serving to close closure]

ATAP.content: lever/relever all senses (meanings) pressing around Hebrew gala, in front of columns/colossi of Greece, in front of the galactic, the milky ways that fascinate me
ATAP.linkedContent: lever/relever all senses (meanings) pressing around Hebrew gala, in front of columns/colossi of Greece, in front of the galactic, the milky ways that fascinate me

ATAP.content: relever of tone, dream of philosophy: make tonal difference inaudible, neutrality of tone, affect works (over) concept as contraband
ATAP.linkedContent: relever of tone, dream of philosophy: make tonal difference inaudible, neutrality of tone, affect works (over) concept as contraband

SPEC.content: no relève of PP [re: Freud’s Beyond…]—not Hegelian [since PP always master?] > in fact, function of PP, (postal) binding, determines interpretation of Aufhebung
SPEC.linkedContent: no relève of PP [re: Freud’s Beyond…]—not Hegelian [since PP always master?] > in fact, function of PP, (postal) binding, determines interpretation of Aufhebung

FV.content: Lacan’s emphasis on logos as phonē, writing relevé by voice, phonetic fact is only a fact w/in limits of “phonetic” systems of writing (beyond relation of de facto to de jure, Derrida interested in Lacan’s implied equivalence btwn symbolic articulation & phonematicity)
FV.linkedContent: Lacan’s emphasis on logos as phonē, writing relevé by voice, phonetic fact is only a fact w/in limits of “phonetic” systems of writing (beyond relation of de facto to de jure, Derrida interested in Lacan’s implied equivalence btwn symbolic articulation & phonematicity)

FV.content: [phonematic limitation of letter, phonē spared divisibility] voice: spontaneous self-presence one can retain (garder) w/out paper, w/out envelope, always available (disponible) > Lacan’s not attentive to writing w/in the voice, before the letter
FV.linkedContent: [phonematic limitation of letter, phonē spared divisibility] voice: spontaneous self-presence one can retain (garder) w/out paper, w/out envelope, always available (disponible) > Lacan’s not attentive to writing w/in the voice, before the letter

FV.content: sheltered (à l’abri) from disseminating threat/power in OG, agency of Lacan’s letter is the relève of writing in system of speech
FV.linkedContent: sheltered (à l’abri) from disseminating threat/power in OG, agency of Lacan’s letter is the relève of writing in system of speech

FV.content: systemic & historical link btwn idealization, relève (Aufhebung), and the voice > Lacan’s elevation of signifier
FV.linkedContent: systemic & historical link btwn idealization, relève (Aufhebung), and the voice > Lacan’s elevation of signifier

FV.content: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”
FV.linkedContent: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”

FV.content: Lacan reversed Hegel: not ideal signified but ideal signifier
FV.linkedContent: Lacan reversed Hegel: not ideal signified but ideal signifier
